summary: This mod changes the appearance of Lydia in game. Needs \\\"Apachii Sky Hair\\\" mod!
descriptionHtml:
Ok so i updated Lydia so she doesnt look as plastic as the earlier version. This version makes her a mage instead of a one-handed warrior. 
She no longer has that weird mannish physique or voice.. She has a much prettier face with the voice of a young female character.

**** Please note that the first picture is user-submitted, and it features a different armour set. Look at the second and third picture to see what armour you actually get with this mod ****

Installation:
- Download the Tribunal Robes and Masks mod (link is in credits)
- Download Apachii Sky Hair mod (Link is in credits)
- Install both mods FIRST
- Download my mod
- Extract my file and place the Data folder into the Skyrim folder 
- Copy and replace if prompted
- Delete Tribunal Robes by Zairaam.ESP in your Data folder, NOT THE ESM FILE! 
  The ESP file comes with the actual Tribunal Robes and Masks mod, delete that one and keep the one that comes in my mod (The ESM file)


Credits: 
Apachii\'s mod \"ApachiiSkyHair\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Tribunal robes and masks by Zairaam : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077
author: Barry
